descriptions: Teams net points while player is on the court.

videos.description: Luka Doncic gets the hoop and the harm after slicing through the Rockets' defense.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Luka weaves through defense for and-1 basket) 2022/03/12 ESHEET

videos.headline: Luka weaves through defense for and-1 basket

videos.description: Kevin Porter Jr. is bumped while driving to the hoop, but gets his shot to drop anyway.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (KPJ sinks tough jumper while falling down) 2022/03/12 ESHEET

videos.headline: KPJ sinks tough jumper while falling down

videos.description: Alperen Sengun rises up between Luka Doncic and Maxi Kleber to throw down a powerful dunk.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Sengun throws down emphatic lefty jam in traffic) 2022/03/12 ESHEET

videos.headline: Sengun throws down emphatic lefty jam in traffic

videos.description: Luka Doncic blows by Kenyon Martin Jr. to score at the rim.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Doncic dances on defender for the hoop and the harm) 2022/03/12 ESHEET

videos.headline: Doncic dances on defender for the hoop and the harm

videos.description: Trey Burke can't convert at the rim, but Dwight Powell is there for the putback, plus the foul.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Dwight Powell crashes offensive glass to score) 2022/03/12 ESHEET

videos.headline: Dwight Powell crashes offensive glass to score

videos.description: Dwight Powell goes to work in the post to score for the Mavericks.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Dwight Powell shows off his post moves) 2022/03/12 ESHEET

videos.headline: Dwight Powell shows off his post moves

videos.description: Luka Doncic rejects Kenyon Martin Jr.'s dunk attempt.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Luka rises for big block at the rim) 2022/03/12 ESHEET

videos.headline: Luka rises for big block at the rim

videos.description: The Mavericks extend their big lead over the Rockets as Josh Green easily scores on the fast break.

videos.headline: Josh Green hits acrobatic shot in transition

videos.description: Garrison Mathews nails deep 3-pointer from downtown
